mapper.insert: insert into saving (saving_name, saving_content, max_deposit, saving_period, saving_cycle, rate, img, isPrime) values (#{savingName}, #{savingContent}, #{maxDeposit}, #{savingPeriod}, #{savingCycle}, #{rate}, #{img},#{isPrime});
mapper.select: SELECT distinct s.saving_name, s.saving_content, s.max_deposit, s.saving_period, s.saving_cycle, s.img, s.rate AS rate, CASE WHEN s.isPrime = 'Y' THEN pr.prime_rate ELSE 0 END AS prime_rate FROM Saving s LEFT JOIN Prime_rate pr ON s.saving_id = pr.saving_id WHERE (s.isPrime = 'Y' OR pr.prime_rate IS NULL);
